description: The src/index.js file initializes the React application by rendering the App component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up the root rendering context and wraps the App component in React.StrictMode for development checks.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component tree into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root.
